title: India becomes Suzuki's second market to cross 3 crore cumulative production mark
description: Suzuki Motor Corporation's subsidiary, Maruti Suzuki India, achieves a significant milestone by producing over 3 crore units in India, making it the second country after Japan to reach this feat. The achievement comes in just 40 years and 4 months since production began in December 1983, outpacing Japan's record.
